availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram H. Davis (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Anna Gad Davis in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, on January 1, 1856. Father of Ann Davis. Married to Leyna Vaughn Davis in Jackson County, Kentucky, on June 15, 1861. Resident of Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1856. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 560.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994044, Laurel County Births.
Kentucky, County Marriages, 1797-1954, Genealogical Society of Salt Lake City, Salt Lake City, UT, Rockcastle County Marriages, Film 000216839.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jackson County Marriages, Film 000802457.
